entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0004.9289] Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities with a value of 56,165,000 is not equal to the combined total of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations and Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Discontinued Operations ( 18,182,000 + 0 ) with a value of 18,182,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities fact are: Period :2019-01-01 to 2019-09-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities : -3 Decimals of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations : -3 Decimals of Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Discontinued Operations : -3
